price: Ɛno ara ne yεn wiase asetena yi. Yerewu na Yεte ase (anaasε ebi rewu na ebi nso te ase, anaa yεrewu na yεrewo ebi nom nso). Na ԑmma sԑ yεbɛnyane yεn.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
